title: Template Validation Schema
description: JSON Schema for validation blocks in template frontmatter. Defines structure for template-driven validation rules.

schema_version.description: Schema version for validation block structure. Must be 1.

extends.description: Optional list of template files to inherit validation rules from.

conditions.description: Named predicate expressions for conditional validation rules. Keys must be valid identifiers, values must be function calls.

title_pattern.description: Regular expression that document title (first H1) must match.

max_lines.description: Maximum number of lines allowed in the document.

pattern.description: Regular expression pattern to forbid in document content.

reason.description: Human-readable explanation for why this pattern is forbidden.

severity.description: Severity level: error blocks validation, warn is informational.

forbidden.description: List of forbidden patterns with explanations.

must_exist.description: If true, section must be present in document.

require_if.description: Condition name from conditions block. Section required if condition evaluates to true.

forbid_if.description: Condition name from conditions block. Section forbidden if condition evaluates to true.

max_paragraphs.description: Maximum number of paragraphs allowed in this section.

min_paragraphs.description: Minimum number of paragraphs required in this section.

max_sentences.description: Maximum number of sentences allowed in this section.

content_pattern.description: Regular expression that section content must match.

pattern.description: Regular expression that subsection heading markers must match (e.g., '^### ').

subsections_required.description: Rules for subsections within this section.

must_list_all_md.description: If true, section must list all .md files in directory.

must_list_all_subdirs.description: If true, section must list all subdirectories.

exclude_globs.description: Glob patterns for files to exclude from listing requirement.

entry_pattern.description: Regular expression that each file listing entry must match.

files_rules.description: Rules for file/directory listings within section.

required_sections.description: List of section requirements with structural and content constraints.

filename_pattern.description: Regular expression that the document filename must match.

required_fields.description: List of frontmatter fields that must be present.

pattern.description: Regular expression that field value must match.

min_items.description: Minimum number of items for array fields.

max_items.description: Maximum number of items for array fields.

if_field.description: Field name to check for conditional constraint.

equals.description: Value that if_field must equal for constraint to apply.

then_required.description: Fields that become required when condition is met.

then_forbidden.description: Fields that become forbidden when condition is met.

conditional_constraints.description: Conditional field requirements based on other field values.

forbidden_fields.description: List of field names that must not be present in frontmatter.
